  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException
      Starts program for Library Management System. Integrates with a database and arraylist to allow users to add book information to a collection/database, with methods to add a book, remove a book, check out a book, check in a book, and update and show contents
      Parameters:
      args - main program
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addBookToList

      public static void addBookToList(ArrayList<LMS> arrayList)
      Calls addBook method from LMS class. Takes in user input for book information. Adds to arraylist and updated with database functionality
      Parameters:
      arrayList - arrayList of books

    • removeBook

      public static void removeBook(ArrayList<LMS> arrayList)
      Method to delete a book from a connected database and arraylist by title or barcode
      Parameters:
      arrayList - arraylist to remove user input from

    • readFile

      public static void readFile(File fileP) throws IOException
      Prints out contents of file
      Parameters:
      fileP - file to read
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkOut

      public static void checkOut(ArrayList<LMS> arrayList)
      Updated method to include a database functionality which takes in arraylist. Lists books in file/database, asks user for title of books, checks for availability, sets book status to checked out, and updates due date
      Parameters:
      arrayList - list of books

    • checkIn

      public static void checkIn(ArrayList<LMS> arrayList)
      Updated for use with a database and arraylist. Lists collection of books, asks user for a title, and sets that book status to checked in and updates due date
      Parameters:
      arrayList - arrayList of type LMS objects

    • writeToFile

      public static void writeToFile(File file, ArrayList<LMS> arrayList) throws IOException
      Writes arraylist contents into a file.
      Parameters:
      file - file to be written to
      arrayList - list of books
      Throws:
      IOException
